name: react-classy
description: A composable, extensible, and simple solution for styling React components.
author: InTurn <ops@inturn.co> (https://github.com/inturn)

scripts.test: npm run min:components && npm run -s mocha -- --reporter nyan --require mocha.config test/*.spec.js
scripts.min:components: npm run rimraf -- ./test/components.min.js && babel ./test/components.js --stage 0 --optional runtime  | npm run uglifyjs -- --compress --mangle  --keep-fnames -o ./test/components.min.js
scripts.babel:src: npm run -s rimraf -- lib && npm run -s babel -- src --out-dir lib --stage 0 --optional runtime
scripts.lint: npm run -s eslint -s -- src && cat winning.txt
scripts.coverage: npm run -s istanbul -- cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --reporter nyan --require mocha.config test/*.spec.js
